title: Contracts with Private Investigations Firms (Palm Springs Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current contracts between the police department and private investigation and/or background investigation companies.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

William Frederick

title: Novato City Council Training Manual and Handbook

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Novato City Council Training Manual and Handbook
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All documents that pertain to the training of Novato City Council Members.

All documents that pertain to the policies and procedures for how City Council Members should interface with City Staff.

All documents that pertain to handbooks, instruction manuals, for Novato City Council Members.

All documents that pertain to handbooks, instruction manuals, for how Staff are suppose to interact with Novato City Council Members.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson
